barriers.name: Computational Resources
barriers.description: Building and running large language models requires extensive computational power, making scalability and memory management significant challenges.

barriers.name: Specialized Talent Shortage
barriers.description: The lack of qualified professionals skilled in AI and machine learning makes it difficult to assemble and maintain LLMs effectively.

barriers.name: High Energy Consumption
barriers.description: The energy demands of training and operating LLMs result in costly operations and raise concerns about environmental sustainability.

barriers.name: Financial Constraints
barriers.description: The financial burden of training LLMs is overwhelming for smaller organizations, and while cloud services offer solutions, they come with steep costs.

barriers.name: Model Maintenance and Transparency
barriers.description: As LLMs evolve, maintaining their performance and transparency becomes more complex, particularly in fields requiring high reliability.
